legislation: Constitutional Reform and Governance Bill 2008-09 then 2009-10
description: Letters dated 15/03/2010 from Lord Bach to Baroness D'Souza, Lord Shutt of Greetland and Baroness Anelay of St Johns regarding the Constitutional Reform and Governance Bill. Inc information in relation to delegated powers and related documents in Parts 1, 7, 10 and 11 of the Constitutional Reform and Governance Bill. 70 p.
